amendment.description: An amendment numbered 79 printed in Part A of House Report 118-261 to prohibit funds to enforce the final rule of the Environmental Protection Agency titled "Endangerment and Cause of Contribute Findings for Greenhouse Gases Under Section 202(a) of the Clean Air Act.".

vote.text: On agreeing to the Burlison amendment (A031) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Burlison amendment (A031) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Burlison amendment (A031) Agreed to by voice vote.
